column5: Cozy 2 story house... 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, living area with TV, wifi. Fully equiped kitchen and laundry room. Conveniently located 3 minutes from The Shops at La Cantera, 5 minutes to The Rim and Six Flags, and 15 minutes from SeaWorld. Located blocks away from UTSA.
column8: Cozy house near shopping and parks.
